title: Widevine L1 turn to L3 after unlock bootloader and root on pixel 4 xl
content:
I got my new pixel 4 xl last week,and I unlock bootloader and root by magisk,and my widevine become L3,tried flash factory image and lock bootloader,still L3
(I didn't flash any kernal or custom rom, only magisk)
I unlock bootloader on 2021/3 update
